text:
The block comment says try_flipped is called from pce_exec() and also from
pcre_fullinfo().

But it is actually called from pcre_info and pcre_exec. Shall we update the
comment so that it won't confuse people?


/* This function is called from pce_exec() and also from pcre_fullinfo(). Its
...
*/

static real_pcre *
try_flipped(const real_pcre *re, real_pcre *internal_re,
  const pcre_study_data *study, pcre_study_data *internal_study)
creator: tammy000@gmail.com

text:
PCRE is a third-party library.  Bug reports should be directed to its developers
rather than to Apache.

Of course, the correct fix for Apache is to unbundle it.
creator: nick@webthing.com
